entry.def: You use sometimes to say that something happens on some occasions rather than all the time.

example.ex: During the summer, my skin sometimes gets greasy...
example.tran: 夏天我的皮肤有时候会出油。

example.ex: Sometimes I think he dislikes me...
example.tran: 有时候，我觉得他不喜欢我。

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes the best treatment might be the most expensive.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: And he has a theory of love that argues that it’s made up of three components: intimacy,passion and commitment, or what is sometimes called decision commitment.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes it's only when a difficulty is removed that we realise what it was doing for us.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: There is another survey, sometimes referred to as the "payroll survey," that assesses 400000 businesses based on their reported payrolls.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Instead of protecting speech and encouraging diversity and innovative thinking, the tenure system often stifles(压制)them: younger professors must win the approval of established colleagues for tenure, encouraging like-mindedness and sometimes inhibiting the free flow of ideas.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes this anger translates into physical aggression or violence.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The machine would not be a passive participant but would add its own suggestions, information, and opinions; it would sometimes take the initiative in developing or changing the topic and would have a personality of its own.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: For instance, witnesses sometimes see photographs of several suspects before they try to identify the person they saw in a lineup of people.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: People sometimes have difficulty identifying people of other races
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes it is cold as 26 degrees below centigrade.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: It is sometimes a bit depressing
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Japanese listeners sometimes closed their eyes to enhance concentration.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Why do Japanese listeners sometimes close their eyes while listening to a speech
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Proverbs, sometimes called sayings, are examples of folk wisdom.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Miss Hayes enjoys working for a newspaper but she sometimes gets unhappy about all the crime she has to report.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: "Sometimes it goes wrong, but most of the time it doesn't, " says Swanson, who recommends starting to ask children permission to post narratives or photos around ages 6 to 8.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: And he has a theory of love that argues that it's made up of three components: intimacy,passion and commitment, or what is sometimes called decision commitment.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: As constant travelers and parents of a 2-year-old, we sometimes fantasize about how much work we can do when one of us gets on a plane, undistracted by phones, friends, or movies.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: But I think your profession is sometimes underrated, and many people think anyone who speaks more than one language can do it.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: But that won't stop inventors from dreaming up new ways to fly and trying to persuade investors to back their sometimes outrageous schemes.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: But the status quo can be problematic, since a change in the course of action can sometimes be important and lead to a positive outcome.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: In fact, they sometimes take their own lives because they are treated so badly, and because they believe they will be born again, free and living in their own land.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: It's certainly varied and sometimes bizarre.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Of course, sometimes things happen at the last moment and I don't have a chance.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Professor sometimes implement policies designed to  minimize students' use of digital devices, and some instructors even confiscate tablets and phones.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读

Sentence.sentence: So they get involved by looking at advertising and really critically assessing the consumer behaviour aspects of it and getting involved sometimes doing primary research.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes a young child may get overexcited and be a little too rough, but it's never a serious matter.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes the old stuff just works better or more efficiently.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes we see things as human because we are lonely.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes when you take a common drug, you may have a side effect.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: This little bit of support can sometimes make a big difference.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: We "stop" work sometimes at 5 pm, but then we spend the night wrestling with solutions to work problems, talking about our work over dimer, and falling asleep thinking about how much work we'll do tomorrow.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: What they sometimes lack is feedback from the people who they hope will use their products.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: When the birds forget to retrieve their food—and they do sometimes—a seedling has a chance to grow.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Whereas local collaborations sometimes persist past the point of usefulness because of social or academic obligations, international ones can be cultivated and dropped more freely.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

means.word_mean: 1. on certain occasions or in certain cases but not always;

sentences.sentence: "sometimes she wished she were back in England"
"sometimes they come for a month; at other times for six months"

Sentence.sentence: Almost every grandparent wants to be with his or her grandchildren and is willing to make sacrifices, but sometimes it is wiser to say no and visit frequently instead.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Also, sometimes pre-anger does not have to do with a lasting condition, but rather a temporary state before a triggering event has occurred.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Bechtel, who works in downtown west palm beach, has lunch with coworkers sometimes, but like many of us, too often works through lunch at her desk.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: But sometimes it seems too hard to leave the sofa.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: But sometimes we're not aware how cheaply we can make this food ourselves.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Even though family members sometimes disagreed with each other, they worked together to make the business successful.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语安徽卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Everything they know about you came through this device, sometimes from hundreds of miles away.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: I sometimes wished to find another agent.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Memory is sometimes a tricky thing.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（11月） 阅读理解 七选五 选项

Sentence.sentence: Norton sound was covered with ice, which could sometimes break up without warning.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语北京卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Respect them and value their opinions, even if they annoy you sometimes.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（10月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Seventeen states allow parents to get an exemption豁免, sometimes just by signing a paper saying they personally object to a vaccine.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes even routine occurrences become sources of pre-anger, or anger itself.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes he wore a duck hat, and I would tell myself, he was definitely an fan of dr.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes her family didn't have enough to eat.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes I act as a listening ear for fellow students to talk over what is bothering them.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 单项选择 原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes ignorance and negative outlooks on situations can create anger.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes it's good to just smile, nod your head and listen.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（11月） 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes neighbors may go to the supermarket together to do shopping.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 七选五 选项

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes people simply can't trust anymore.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes this technique would not work, and I had to pick up the set and shake it to remove the sound.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes we decide that a little unnecessary danger is worth it because when we weigh the risk and the reward, the risk seems worth tasking.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读E 原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes we have disagreements with people.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语福建卷 短文填词 原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes, sitting on a bus or a train, she hears only a fragment of a particularly interesting story.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: The downside is that in those dead periods I often would let my thoughts flow and sometimes would have an unexpected insight or idea.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: The inspections were supposed to be a surprise, but keeper sometimes had advance notice.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: The mail can be really slow sometimes.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（11月） 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: There are energy savings to be made from all recyclable materials, sometimes huge savings.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（11月） 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: With great care she began the dangerous crossing, sometimes on her hands and knees, hardly daring to look down between the sleepers into the wild flood waters below.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（10月） 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Working in such a competitive industry, I've sometimes thought, I can't do this any more.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes years are required for truly novel discovery claims to be accepted and appreciated.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes I feel in his late works a will to break all signs of continuity.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: Music means different things to different people and sometimes even different things to the same person at different moments of his life.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: Today, professors routinely treat the progressive interpretation of history and progressive public policy as the proper subject of study while portraying conservative or classical liberal ideas —such as free markets, self-reliance—as falling outside the boundaries of routine, and sometimes legitimate, intellectual investigation.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes storms blew the vessels far off their course, and often calm brought unbearably long delay.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: Symbolic of national unity as they claim to be, their very history—and sometimes the way they behave today – embodies outdated and indefensible privileges and inequalities.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: New, disruptive technology sometimes demands novel applications of the Constitution’s protections.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes that’s worth making a change anyway.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Curiosity is often considered a good instinct－It can lead to new scientific advances, for instance－but sometimes such inquiry can backfire.
Sentence.come: 2018年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: For public institutions, state funds are sometimes tied partly to their success on metrics such as graduation rates and student retention—so better grades can, by boosting figures like those, mean more money.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: However, when done too often, this habit can sometimes hurt more than it helps.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: Human drivers sometimes must make split-second decisions.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）翻译 Section Ⅲ

Sentence.sentence: Humility requires you to recognize weakness in your own arguments and sometimes also to accept reasons on the opposite side.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）翻译 Section Ⅲ

Sentence.sentence: In France, shareholders who hold onto a company investment for at least two years can sometimes earn more voting rights in a company.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: It's also a good idea to shop daily instead of weekly, because, being-human, you'll sometimes change your mind about what you fancy.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: New, disruptive technology sometimes demands novel applications of the Constitution's protections.
Sentence.come: 2015年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes it is easy to feel bad because you are going through tough times.
Sentence.come: 2015年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes parents get exhausted and frustrated and are unable to maintain a tolerant and composed style with their kids.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: The overweight are sometimes pictured in the media with their faces covered.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: Today, professors routinely treat the progressive interpretation of history and progressive public policy as the proper subject of study while portraying conservative or classical liberal ideas — such as free markets, self-reliance — as falling outside th
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Try to slot it as a to-do list item and you'll manage only goal-focused reading-useful, sometimes, but not the most fulfilling kind.
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: You're only human, and sometimes your kids can push you just a little too far.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

sentences.cn: 有时我坐车去。
sentences.en: Sometimes I go by car.

sentences.cn: 他偶尔给我写封信。
sentences.en: He sometimes writes to me.

sentences.cn: 有时候我喜欢一个人待着。
sentences.en: I like to be on my own sometimes.

sentences.cn: 夏天我的皮肤有时候会出油。
sentences.en: During the summer, my skin sometimes gets greasy...

sentences.cn: 有时候，我觉得他不喜欢我。
sentences.en: Sometimes I think he dislikes me...

sentences.cn: 我会杨胜军副会长出席会议.
sentences.en: Vice President Yang Shengjun attended.

sentences.cn: 她有时用竹竿当手杖.
sentences.en: She sometimes uses a bamboo as a stick.

sentences.cn: 他的陈述有时偏离事实.
sentences.en: His statements sometimes deviated from the truth.

sentences.cn: 她有时无缘无故就生气.
sentences.en: She sometimes angers with little or no provocation.

sentences.cn: 有时候正式英语与非正式英语要十分小心地加以区分.
sentences.en: Sometimes formal English and informal English must be carefully distinguished.

sentences.cn: 有时候,偏见会妨碍人正确行事.
sentences.en: Prejudice sometimes hampers a person from doing the right thing.

sentences.cn: 手术之后腹部有时会出现粘连.
sentences.en: Abdominal tissues sometimes adhere after an operation.

sentences.cn: 天气预报有的时候准, 有的时候不准.
sentences.en: Sometimes the weather forecast is accurate, sometimes not.

sentences.cn: 有时候我喝一品脱浓啤酒.
sentences.en: I sometimes enjoy a pint of ale.

sentences.cn: 然而在实际生活中, 有些事情有时候的确好象神差鬼使一样地促成了一些除了十九世纪小说家外谁也不会相信的巧合.
sentences.en: Yet, in real life, circumstances do sometimes conspire to bring about coincidences which anyone but a nineteenth century novelist would find incredible.

sentences.cn: 他有时就是自命高人一头.
sentences.en: He does get above himself sometimes.

sentences.cn: 人们倾向于积攒东西, 有的并未意识到这样做.
sentences.en: People tend to amass possessions, sometimes without being aware of doing so.

sentences.cn: 即便是朋友有时也有分歧。
sentences.en: Even friends disagree sometimes.

sentences.cn: 狮子有时单独猎食。
sentences.en: Lions sometimes hunt alone.

sentences.cn: 在顾客服务方面，有时小企业可能优于大企业。
sentences.en: Sometimes small firms can outdo big business when it comes to customer care.

sentences.cn: 教师有时候假定学生的知识水平相当高。
sentences.en: Teachers sometimes presuppose a fairly high level of knowledge by the students.

sentences.cn: 妄想有时也具有潜在的破坏性。
sentences.en: Delusions are sometimes insidiously destructive.

sentences.cn: 抽烟斗的人用牙齿咬住烟斗，有时会把齿尖磨平。
sentences.en: Pipe smokers sometimes wear down the tips of their teeth where they grip their pipes.

sentences.cn: 汤姆承认玩电子游戏有时会使他无心做作业。
sentences.en: Tom admits that playing video games sometimes distracts him from his homework.

sentences.cn: 居民们抱怨在街上遭到骚扰和攻击，有时甚至被抢钱的人搜身。
sentences.en: Residents complain about being harassed on the street, roughed up, sometimes even shaken down for their money.

sentences.cn: “我有时言行很过分，不知道为什么。”她开始感觉自己像个恶霸。
sentences.en: "I come on strong sometimes. Don't know why." She was beginning to feel like a bully.

sentences.cn: 有时我坐车去。
sentences.en: Sometimes I go by car.

sentences.cn: 有时候我喜欢一个人待着。
sentences.en: I like to be on my own sometimes.

sentences.cn: 夏天我的皮肤有时候会出油。
sentences.en: During the summer, my skin sometimes gets greasy...

sentences.cn: 有时候，我觉得他不喜欢我。
sentences.en: Sometimes I think he dislikes me...

sentences.cn: 有时候，需要历经多年人们才会接受真正新颖的发现声明。
sentences.en: Sometimes years are required for truly novel discovery claims to be accepted and appreciated.

sentences.cn: 新的破坏性技术有时需要宪法保护范围的新颖应用。
sentences.en: New, disruptive technology sometimes demands novel applications of the Constitution's protections.

sentences.cn: 无论如何，有时值得做出改变。【句子解析】本句是一个简单句，由“主语（that) +系动同（is) +表语（worth)”构成，动名同短语make a change 作表语worth的补足语；副词Sometimes作时间状语，副词anyway作状语。
sentences.en: Sometimes that’s worth making a change anyway.有时候，这反而值得我们做出改变。

sentences.cn: 超重的人有时在媒体拍摄中出现时脸部都是被遮住的。
sentences.en: The overweight are sometimes pictured in the media with their faces covered.

sentences.cn: 有时，因为正处于困难时期，你容易失意，
sentences.en: Sometimes it is casy to feel bad because you are going through tough times.

sentences.cn: 好奇心通常被认为是一种有益的本能——比如它能带来新的科学进步——但有时这种探究可能会适得其反。
sentences.en: Curiosity is often considered a good instinct－it can lead to new scientific advances, for instance－but sometimes such inquiry can backfire.

sentences.cn: 不，有时它们会发生冲突。
sentences.en: They don’t; sometimes they clash.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 有时候，最好的治疗可能也是最昂贵的。
sentences.en: Sometimes the best treatment might be the most expensive.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 当鸟儿忘记把存好的食物找出来时——它们有时确实会忘——种子就有机会发芽生长了。
sentences.en: When the birds forget to retrieve their food—and they do sometimes—a  seedling  has  a  chance  to  grow.
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 当然有时事情发生在最后一刻，我没机会看。
sentences.en: Of course,  sometimes things happen at the last moment and I don’t have a chance.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 但我认为你们的职业有时被低估了，许多人认为任何一个会说一种以上语言的人都能做口译。
sentences.en: But I think your profession is sometimes underrated, and many people think anyone who speaks more than one language can do it.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 他提出了一个理论，指出爱情由三部分组成：亲密关系，情欲和承诺，或有时候被称为决定承诺。
sentences.en: And  he  has  a theory  of  love  that  argues  that  it’s  made  up of  three  components:  intimacy,passion  and commitment,  or  what  is  sometimes  called decision commitment.
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 有时，这可能会导致危险甚至致命的反应。
sentences.en: Sometimes, this can cause dangerous or even fatal reactions
sentences.from: 17年12月六级真题(第二套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 她这么做不是为了把你逼 ( 31 )  疯；相反，她正了解到她和你的欲望可以是不同的，而且这些( 32 )  分歧有时很重要，有时则不重要。
sentences.en: She is not doing this to drive you 31 crazy; rather, she is learning that her desires and yours can differ, and that sometimes those 32 differences are important and sometimes they are not.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 虽然老一辈人有时候不愿意采用新技术，但无人驾驶型汽车会特别为这个年龄段的群体带来实实在在的好处。
sentences.en: Whereas older generations  are  sometimes  reluctant  to  adopt  new  technologies,  driverless  cars  promise  real  value  to  these  age  groups  in  particular.
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 这种培训有时会涉及技术，但通常不会。
sentences.en: Sometimes this involves technology, but often it does not.

sentences.cn: 信息并不是一味涌入大脑的，相反，旧信息有时会被挤出大脑，以腾出位置让新记忆形成。
sentences.en: Instead of just crowding in, old information is sometimes pushed out of the brain for new memories to form.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 有时候，人们太喜欢或需要毒品了，没有毒品就不行。
sentences.en: Sometimes people like drugs or need drugs so much, they can’t do without them.

sentences.cn: 有时我不是真的很想和别人交谈。

sentences.en: W:  So  I  think  it’s  the  restrictions  that  create the dangers sometimes.

sentences.cn: 有时，Jody 觉得她成功说服了一些学生停止节食；而有时，她觉得她失败了。
sentences.en: Sometimes,  Jody  feels  that  she  succeeds  in  persuading  some students to stop dieting; other  times, she feels that she fails.

sentences.cn: 有时，员工会从日常工作中解放几周，用这段时间去创新室交流想法。

sentences.cn: 我们中的大多数人可能都间或体会过这样的沮丧感，即旧记忆干扰着重要的新记忆。
sentences.en: And most of us may sometimes feel the frustration of having old memories interfere with new, relevant memories.

sentences.cn: 她间或透过窗帘的缝隙能瞥见手电筒的闪光.
sentences.en: Sometimes she saw the flash of a torch through a chink in the curtains.

sentences.cn: 有时,函数计算可能超过预期时间, 或进入无限循环.
sentences.en: Sometimes function evaluation may take longer than expected, or enter infinite loop.

sentences.cn: 邓小平以残酷且间或辉煌的方式领导了中国18年.
sentences.en: Deng Xiaoping lead China brutally and sometimes brilliantly for 18 years.

sentences.cn: 部分地改变的事差不多每一作战都是有的, 全部地改变的事也是间或有的.
sentences.en: The plan is partially changed in almost every operation, and sometimes it is even changed completely.

sentences.cn: 有时候在你繁忙期间或遇到有难度需求时,我们就在这里为你服务.
sentences.en: We're here to help with this sometimes time consuming and tricky task!

sentences.cn: 电工:时而会有火花,但我们已经接了安全地线.
sentences.en: Electrician : Sometimes sparks do shoot up but we have ground wire, which keeps us safe.

sentences.cn: 冬天是一个性格乖戾的少年, 时而温顺伶俐, 时而搞些恶作剧.
sentences.en: Winter is a cynical character of the juvenile, sometimes docile Lingli , sometimes engage in some mischief.

sentences.cn: 青春如歌, 亦如随波而流, 时而低沉, 时而高亢.
sentences.en: Cantabile youth, as well as and flow, sometimes low, sometimes sonorous.

sentences.cn: 天气时而热时而冷.
sentences.en: It is sometimes warm and sometimes cold.

sentences.cn: 培根下笔, 时而洋洋洒洒, 时而十分简约, 潇洒飘逸,有大将风度, 口吻十分自信、认真.

sentences.cn: 时而还有阵阵微风吹来.
sentences.en: Sometimes there is a cool breeze.

sentences.cn: 气候冷而多变, 时而下雨, 时而下雪, 有时还下冰雹.
sentences.en: The weather is cold and changeable . Now it rains, now It'snows, sometimes it hails.

sentences.cn: 时而刷子的动作为同步, 时而又不同步.
sentences.en: Sometimes the strokes were in synchronicity , sometimes they weren't.

sentences.cn: 叫卖声时而入耳,招揽了不少人驻足留恋.

sentences.cn: QT间期可能会随时变化, 这就可能出现时而过长时而正常的情况.
sentences.en: The QT interval may change from time to time, sometimes being long and other times normal.

sentences.cn: 在记忆的空间里游荡, 时而感伤, 时而微笑, 痴痴傻傻.
sentences.en: Space in memory loitering, sometimes sentimental, sometimes smiling, wait.

sentences.cn: 胸部痛有时因改变体位而减轻, 但只是暂时而已.
sentences.en: The chest pain is sometimes relieved by a change of position, but only temporarily.

sentences.cn: 天气时而是小雨, 时而是倾盆大雨, 时而是狂风暴雨.
sentences.en: Sometimes it drizzles, sometimes it pours, and sometimes there are showers and storms.

sentences.cn: 他时而使用召唤, 时而创造镜像,或者干脆突然消失,以此来迷惑敌人.
sentences.en: He confuses the enemy by summoning or creating copies himself, and sometimes disappearing.

sentences.cn: 她声音甜润, 时而口若悬河,时而拖声拖气.
sentences.en: She had a sweet voice, sometimes rapid and sometimes drawling in her throat.

sentences.cn: 她时而喜, 时而悲, 成天就在这种悲喜无常的情绪中度日.
sentences.en: Sometimes she's happy, sometimes she's sad . Such feelings are all part of her daily round.

sentences.cn: 蔚蓝色的天空中,时而飘过几朵白云.
sentences.en: Sometimes several clusters of white clouds drift across the blue sky.

sentences.cn: 我知道生活漫长时而黑暗时而有微光.
sentences.en: I know that life is long and sometimes dark and sometimes dim light.

sentences.cn: 电脑时而出故障.
sentences.en: The computer sometimes plays up.

sentences.cn: 这地区频繁的火山活动及地震时而造成惨烈的后果.
sentences.en: Constant volcanic and earthquake action occurs here , sometimes with cataclysmic results.

sentences.cn: 我们时而喜欢,时而讨厌自己的工作.
sentences.en: Sometimes we enjoy what we do and other times we may hate it.

sentences.cn: 蜜蜂嗡嗡的声响时而升起.
sentences.en: The bee's buzzing noise rises sometimes.

sentences.cn: 他把自己的照相机对准了大自然，时而拉近镜头仔细观察一片片的叶子。
sentences.en: He trained his camera on nature, sometimes zooming in to examine single leaves.
